title: An Act relative to penalties for crimes against seniors

abstracts.abstract: By Representative González of Springfield, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1728) of Carlos González relative to penalties for crimes against seniors.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
